snippet: The Big City Book Club returns for 2015, and we’re getting things rolling with Bernard Malamud’s classic New York novel “The Assistant.” Join us for the online discussion of the novel on Thursday, Feb. 12, at 6:30 p.m.
lead_paragraph: The Big City Book Club returns for 2015, and we’re getting things rolling with Bernard Malamud’s classic New York novel “The Assistant.” Join us for the online discussion of the novel on Thursday, Feb. 12, at 6:30 p.m.
